conversations.content: Create a workspace for the mobile app project

tool_call: memoryManager_createWorkspace
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732182000000_u1v2w3x4y", "workspaceId": "ws_1732182000000_z5a6b7c8d", "sessionDescription": "Setting up mobile development environment", "sessionMemory": "User planning to build cross-platform mobile application. Previous workspace contained 12 project assets. New workspace will organize development, testing, and deployment workflows separately for clarity.", "toolContext": "Creating dedicated workspace to establish clear organizational structure that separates mobile development concerns and enables systematic workflow management", "primaryGoal": "Build cross-platform mobile app", "subgoal": "Establish workspace foundation with organized structure"}, "name": "Mobile App Development", "rootFolder": "/projects/mobile-app", "purpose": "Mobile application development workspace", "currentGoal": "Build cross-platform mobile app", "workflows": ["development", "testing", "deployment"]}
Search for 'error handling' in the src directory

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732182600000_a7b8c9d0e", "workspaceId": "ws_1732182600000_f1g2h3i4j", "sessionDescription": "Reviewing error handling patterns", "sessionMemory": "Previously reviewed 8 files for exception patterns. Found 3 critical error cases. Now need to locate all error handling implementations to ensure consistent patterns across src directory.", "toolContext": "Searching for error handling code to audit exception patterns and identify areas where error recovery logic needs improvement or standardization", "primaryGoal": "Establish consistent error handling across codebase", "subgoal": "Locate and review all error handling implementations in src"}, "query": "error handling", "paths": ["/src"]}
Delete the temporary notes

tool_call: vaultManager_deleteNote
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732182900000_d0e1f2g3h", "workspaceId": "ws_1732182900000_i4j5k6l7m", "sessionDescription": "Removing obsolete temporary documentation", "sessionMemory": "Created 7 temporary note files during brainstorming session. Documented initial requirements and sketches. Now consolidating final notes and removing temporary working files to clean workspace.", "toolContext": "Removing temporary files to reduce clutter and maintain clean workspace organization, keeping only finalized documentation", "primaryGoal": "Maintain organized workspace", "subgoal": "Delete obsolete temporary notes"}, "path": "/temp/temp.md"}
Create an agent for code review

tool_call: agentManager_createAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732183100000_f2g3h4i5j", "workspaceId": "ws_1732183100000_k6l7m8n9o", "sessionDescription": "Establishing code review automation", "sessionMemory": "Team completed 15 manual code reviews this month. Identified recurring patterns in feedback about code quality. Creating agent will automate initial review pass to reduce reviewer workload.", "toolContext": "Creating agent to automate code quality checks and provide consistent initial review feedback before human review, improving efficiency", "primaryGoal": "Automate code quality validation", "subgoal": "Deploy dedicated code review agent"}, "name": "Code Review Agent", "description": "Reviews code for quality and best practices", "prompt": "You are a code review assistant. Focus on code quality, security, and best practices."}
Update the API agent to use the new model

tool_call: agentManager_updateAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732183500000_j6k7l8m9n", "workspaceId": "ws_1732183500000_o0p1q2r3s", "sessionDescription": "Upgrading API documentation capabilities", "sessionMemory": "API Documentation Agent running on older model with 80% coverage. New model provides better context understanding and improved accuracy for complex API patterns. Upgrade will enhance documentation quality.", "toolContext": "Upgrading to new model to improve API documentation quality and reduce errors in generated documentation, leveraging enhanced language understanding", "primaryGoal": "Improve API documentation quality", "subgoal": "Update agent with advanced model version"}, "id": "agent_1732183500000_api123", "name": "API Documentation Agent", "description": "Generates API documentation", "prompt": "You are an API documentation generator."}

tool_call: memoryManager_loadSession

Found 5 issues with authentication flow and 3 with database transaction handling. Session preserved test results and diagnostic data. Resuming now to address identified failures.", "toolContext": "Loading previous session to retrieve test context and results, enabling efficient continuation of debugging work from yesterday's progress", "primaryGoal": "Complete integration test cycle", "subgoal": "Restore yesterday's testing session with diagnostics"}, "sessionId": "session_1732097400000_test456"}

Will disable agent to reduce unnecessary processing overhead and let developers focus on specific edge cases.", "toolContext": "Toggling agent state to disable automated testing temporarily while team focuses on edge case validation and specific scenario testing", "primaryGoal": "Manage testing automation strategy", "subgoal": "Disable automated testing agent"}, "id": "agent_1732184200000_test789"}

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732184500000_t6u7v8w9x", "workspaceId": "ws_1732184500000_y0z1a2b3c", "sessionDescription": "Auditing component dependencies", "sessionMemory": "Refactoring component architecture to reduce coupling. Found 23 components with external dependencies. Now auditing import statements to identify unused imports and simplify dependency trees.", "toolContext": "Searching for all imports to conduct dependency audit and identify unused imports that can be removed, reducing coupling and improving maintainability", "primaryGoal": "Reduce component coupling and dependencies", "subgoal": "Audit component import statements"}, "query": "import", "paths": ["/src/components"]}

Deployed 2 new agents yesterday for monitoring and analytics. Need to verify enabled agents are properly configured and running without conflicts.", "toolContext": "Listing enabled agents to verify recent deployments are active and identify potential configuration issues or conflicts with other agents", "primaryGoal": "Verify agent deployment status", "subgoal": "Review active agents and recent additions"}, "enabledOnly": true}

Consulting again for systematic debugging approach.", "toolContext": "Opening troubleshooting guide to reference systematic debugging methodology and solutions for similar database performance issues", "primaryGoal": "Resolve database performance issue", "subgoal": "Consult troubleshooting documentation"}, "path": "/docs/troubleshooting.md"}

A comprehensive project description.

## Features

- Feature 1
- Feature 2"}

## Deployment

1. Install dependencies: `npm install`
2. Build: `npm run build`
3. Deploy: `npm run deploy`"}

## Prerequisites

- Node.js 18+
- npm 9+

## Steps

1. Clone the repository
2. Run npm install
3. Configure .env file"}
Add the vulnerability reporting section

tool_call: contentManager_appendContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732190200000_y3z4a5b6c", "workspaceId": "ws_1732190200000_d7e8f9g0h", "sessionDescription": "Completing security policy documentation", "sessionMemory": "Security policy created documenting supported versions. ## Reporting Vulnerabilities

Please report security vulnerabilities to security@example.com.
We will respond within 48 hours."}
